{"step_by_step_thinking": "COVID-19 and influenza share many similar symptoms such as fever, cough, body aches, fatigue, and sometimes, vomiting and diarrhea. However, COVID-19 is more likely to cause loss of taste or smell. Despite these differences, it is difficult to distinguish between the two based on clinical symptoms alone. Therefore, laboratory testing is required to confirm a diagnosis.", "answer_choice": "B"}
